## Bio

Pongprapan Pongsophon or shortly, Pong is an associate professor of science education at Kasetsart University, Bangkok, Thailand. He has been working there since 2006. At Kasetsart, he has taught science education courses at bachelor and graduate levels. He uses R on a daily basis, mostly for data manipulation and analysis. He has been studying other R's functionality such as here using r to create a website. Pong is interested in the application of structural equation modeling in science education research. He is a dog and cat lover. In his free time, he is usually found at a cozy cafe in Bangkok reading a newspaper and get himself updated and relaxed.
